\begin{eqnarray}

\frac{\partial G}{\partial x} [0^+, y; t] -

\frac{\partial \hat{G}}{\partial x} [0^+, y; E] - 
\frac{\partial \hat{G}}{\partial x} [0^-, y; E]&=&
2 \hat{v} \hat{G}[0, y; E].
